section.name: Many thanks from the jcaptcha team to :

ul.li: OCTO Technology which is our financial and technical main support!
The captcha.net Team for their research
Jerry Huxtable from jhlabs for his fantastic filter library
Lyonel Thouvenot for the jcaptcha logo
All jcaptcha users for their participation and feed back
Vincent Massol for his support and publicity!
